EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-09-20-CAE-Denver-092617-4.EM-2017-08-30-CAE Denver #4
EmailTemplate.subject: Let Turbonomic Take You Out to the Rockies game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On Tuesday, September 26th the field box will be full of your technology peers for an evening of food, drinks, and of course, baseball with Turbonomic and Corus360 while the Rockies take on the Marlins.
Whether you are a customer today or still considering becoming a part of the family, I hope you will join me for an evening out to get to know the community.
Colorado Rockies vs Miami Marlins <[[https://turbonomic.com/denver-community-appreciation-rockies-vs-marlins/]]>
Where: Coors Field 2001 Blake St., Denver, CO 80205 Tuesday, September 26th 6:40pm
Seats are limited, reserve your spot today <[[https://turbonomic.com/denver-community-appreciation-rockies-vs-marlins/]]>!
I hope to see you there,
Jacob DeLuise Regional Sales Director, Turbonomic
